named-query.name: Book.findByUserId
named-query.query: select b from Book b join b.users u where u.userid = :id

named-query.name: Book.findDistinctYearsByUser
named-query.query: select distinct b.year from Book b join b.users u where u.id = :id order by b.year

named-query.name: Book.findDistinctFirstCharByUser
named-query.query: select distinct substring(b.title,1,1) as char from Book b join b.users u where u.id = :id order by char
